review: I have a Roku box that I love, so for my bedroom TV I wanted the Streaming Stick for price and form factor.I suppose I am a bit spoiled with the box. It is very fast and smooth and I've not had any issues out of it at all.But the Stick is another story completely. It lags SO BAD. It will get hung up on a screen for 20+ seconds, in which time I won't know if the button didn't register, or it froze up. So I'll hit the button another time or two and before I know it all of my button presses rain down on me at the same time in a storm of Netflix+Youtube confusion. And I end up on a completely different app and video and just want to cuss.Once the video gets going, the quality is good. No real complaints there. But if you are even an inkling short on patience... I'd recommend looking elsewhere.
author: Eric Wilhite
